Comments_List: Extended techniques on flute and different forms of expression.
I continued my study of classical vocal technique and got to build upon previous work with my private teacher!

lessons are lovely as they are! Cant think of how to improve the course of study, except maybe some more open-mindedness towards non classical repertoire would be nice (or more thoughtfulness about why repertoire is regulated and what that says about the values of yales Music department and school). Theres no reason to limit the repertoire of study if students have a legitimate technical reason to study a particular song (REGARDLESS of its genre)
This course is great for those who want to take private lessons to still play their instrument at a high level.
Yes! Its so much fun and you learn a lot if you put effort into it.
